destinations.name: Mount Kilimanjaro
destinations.shortDescription: Challenge yourself with Africa's highest peak.
destinations.description: Trek to the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro and experience breathtaking panoramic views, diverse climates, and the thrill of reaching Africa's highest point.

destinations.name: Serengeti National Park
destinations.description: Witness the grandeur of Africa’s wildlife in Serengeti National Park, home to lions, elephants, cheetahs, and the spectacular Great Migration.

destinations.name: Zanzibar Island
destinations.shortDescription: Relax on pristine beaches and enjoy diving.
destinations.description: Unwind on Zanzibar’s white sandy beaches, explore vibrant coral reefs, and enjoy exciting water activities like diving and surfing.

destinations.name: Lake Manyara
destinations.shortDescription: A stunning sanctuary of flamingos and wildlife.
destinations.description: Lake Manyara National Park offers lush scenery, large flamingo flocks, hippos, and tree-climbing lions, making it a perfect safari destination.

destinations.name: Tarangire National Park
destinations.description: Home to large elephant herds and diverse wildlife, Tarangire National Park features scenic river landscapes and baobab-studded plains.

destinations.name: Lake Natron
destinations.shortDescription: Famous for vivid red waters and flamingos.
destinations.description: Lake Natron is renowned for its striking red waters and vast flocks of flamingos, set against dramatic volcanic scenery.

destinations.name: Ngorongoro Crater
destinations.shortDescription: Where humans and wildlife coexist beautifully.
destinations.description: The Ngorongoro Crater is a unique ecosystem where humans live alongside wildlife in a breathtaking volcanic landscape.
